title: Wild Style And Vission Create A G-House Remake Of “Boyz N Tha Hood”
content:
There has been a resurgence of interest in NWA recently with the release of the movie “Straight Outta Compton” and because of this we’ve seen a number of reworks of their classic songs. While some say nothing can top their originals, Wild Style caught the attention of many. The female duo from LA has teamed up with Richard Vission to give Eazy-E’s solo debut a modern makeover! 
 
The have transformed “ Boyz In Da Hood ” into a G-House gem that is club friendly in every sense of the word. Check out the full stream below and enjoy! 
 
Wild Style X Vission – Boyz N Tha Hood | 
 

 
“Follow” Wild Style: | Facebook | Twitter | SoundCloud | 
“Follow” Vission: | Facebook | Twitter | 
 
The post Wild Style And Vission Create A G-House Remake Of “Boyz N Tha Hood” appeared first on thissongslaps.com - Electronic Dance Music & Hip-Hop Media .
